meanings.definition: Having great power or influence beyond the norm.
meanings.sent1: The superhero's ultrapowerful abilities amazed everyone.
meanings.sent2: The ultrapowerful engine of the car made it the fastest on the track.
meanings.sent3: The ultrapowerful blender turned the ice into snow in seconds.
meanings.sent4: Her ultrapowerful presence commanded attention wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The ultrapowerful storm wreaked havoc on the small town.

meanings.definition: Capable of achieving extraordinary results or feats.
meanings.sent1: The ultrapowerful computer processed data at lightning speed.
meanings.sent2: With his ultrapowerful memory, he aced every exam effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The ultrapowerful vacuum cleaner sucked up all the dirt in one go.
meanings.sent4: Her ultrapowerful determination led her to climb the highest mountain.
meanings.sent5: The ultrapowerful potion granted the wizard immense magical abilities.
